title: So Pack
description: The aim of this project was to get familiar with the Next JS framework and build a fully functioning website in React. The website is for a French company that can help you create your own perfumes and cosmetics, from filling to packaging and delivery. The website has a main page with some information about the company and their products and 2 other pages: one about packaging and one describing the full creation process and the services they provide. title: Sticky Notes App
description: I created this project to practice my React and Redux skills, as well as to get used to the workflow with Git. With this app you can create, format, save and delete your sticky notes. Notes can be sorted chronologically.

title: My Portfolio
description: I built this project using Gatsby as I wanted to learn something new while building something I needed. The data in this project is pulled into my components using GraphQL and the projects' pages are programmatically created from the data obtained from my GraphQL queries and then mapped into my page template.

title: Image Gallery
description: The aim of this project was to get familiar with Redux and Material UI (especially with styles and custom components). The project consists of an image gallery to which the user can apply some cool filters.
